Package simu.model

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
simu.model.Customer
public class Customer extends Object
Represents a customer in the store simulation. Customers have a type (regular or express) and a number of items they are purchasing.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Customer(SimulationConfig cfg)
    Creates a new customer with a unique ID and records arrival time.
